description: 屏蔽互联网上的广告

description: 优雅和灵活的linux发行版。最小化原则，所有额外组件都由用户自行选配。

description: ARKOS是一个基于Linux的服务器操作系统，可在小巧的Raspberry Pi硬件上运行，提供电子邮件、聊天、文件共享、虚拟主机等功能。

description: 开源的分组交换机(PBX)系统，支持VoIP/SIP通讯。另有中文化衍生品freeiris。

description: 全方位的隐私保护，提供主机、VPN、电子邮件、即时通讯等服务。 需要许可
name: Autistici/Inventati

description: 基于P2P技术的，没有中央机构的匿名数字货币。也支持匿名通讯。
notes: 请注意，电子加密货币与现实货币的兑换比率可能会波动得非常厉害。此外，软件错误，恶意攻击等也可能导致您的损失。请提前做好准备！
name: Bitcoin

description: IRC即时通讯网关，支持多种协议。
name: BitlBee

description: 比特信：加密的、去中心化的P2P交流工具，基于比特币技术。
notes: Bitmessage is a promising alternative to email, but it has not yet been audited by security professionals. Use at your own risk. If you decide to try out Bitmessage, make sure to generate a completely random ID to greatly reduce the probability of ID collisions.
name: Bitmessage

description: 开源的、联合的社交网络
name: buddycloud

description: Byzantium（拜占庭）是一个提供易用的网状网络的Linux发行版。支持live启动（移动设备免安装启动）

description: 企业级的计算平台，与REHL（红帽）兼容。

description: Cjdns是一种网络协议，制定了计算机之间的信息交换方式。 "该系统只在加密效验双方身份之后才允许通信，而不是采用一个所有人都能使用的IP地址，让任意计算机都能与你连接。

Gentoo GNU/Linux 有一个[关于dm-crypt和LUKS的指南](https://wiki.gentoo.org/wiki/DM-Crypt_LUKS). 

 Arch GNU/Linux 有一个[关于dm-crypt和LUKS的指南](https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/Dm-crypt_with_LUKS) 对Parabola GNU/Linux也适用。

 dm-crypt在DragonFly BSD系统上也适用。

description: 免费、加密的IP电话，用于Android平台。

当你下载了"search.xpi"之后，把后缀名改成".zip"，解压即可。

description: DragonFly BSD是一个自由授权的类UNIX操作系统，衍生自FreeBSD 4.8。开发者Matthew Dillon，在20世纪80年代后期到90年代前期曾是Amiga的开发者，1994年到2003年间参与FreeBSD的开发。2003年6月，他开始开发DragonFly BSD并在7月16号将其发布在FreeBSD的邮寄清单上。
name: DragonFly BSD

description: 匿名、无记录的web搜索
notes:
DuckDuckGo是一个“软件即服务”(SaaS)平台，它可以让你匿名地对[这些来源](https://dukgo.com/help/en_US/results/sources)进行搜索。 DDG开源组件可以在[这里](https://github.com/duckduckgo)得到。

 对于Tor用户，同样有一个DuckDuckGo匿名服务器，地址是[3g2upl4pq6kufc4m.onion](http://3g2upl4pq6kufc4m.onion) 。
name: DuckDuckGo

description: 免费的私密在线日程表，还有隐私增强版。
name: dudle

description: 私密的XMPP服务，运行在DuckDuckGo社区平台。—包含使用说明。

description: GNU/Linux平台下的可移植的企业级加密文件存储系统。
name: eCryptfs

description: 使用Erlang/OTPXMPP编写的，支持GNU/Linux和OS X的XMPP通讯工具。
name: ejabberd

description: 基于文件的加密工具，支持Linux, Mac OS和Windows。
notes: Windows平台可以通过"encfs4win"来使用Encfs.
name: encfs

audit.author: Taylor Hornby
audit.description: EncFS is probably safe as long as the adversary only gets one copy of the ciphertext and nothing more. EncFS is not safe if the adversary has the opportunity to see two or more snapshots of the ciphertext at different times. EncFS attempts to protect files from malicious modification, but there are serious problems with this feature.

description: 雷鸟（Thunderbird）和冰鼬鼠（Icedove）上的一个 OpenPGP 加密插件。
notes: [这里有一份Security In A Box提供的指南](https://securityinabox.org/en/thunderbird_main) ，指导你用Mozilla Thunderbird、GNU Privacy Guard (GPG)和Enigmail加密自己的邮件。 Also read the [Email Self-Defense guide](https://emailselfdefense.fsf.org) by the Free Software Foundation to learn how to encrypt your email messages.
name: Enigmail

description: 共享编辑的电子表格服务器，也可以自行架设。
notes: EtherCalc的在线服务器会使用HTTPS技术加密你传输的数据，但随便什么人只要猜到了你的URL地址就可以浏览那些内容。如果你在意私密性，建议下载源码，自己搭建一个EtherCalc平台。
name: EtherCalc

description: Riseup运营的共享编辑平台，也可以自行架设。
notes: etherpad项目包含一个[提供共享编辑服务的网站清单](https://github.com/ether/etherpad-lite/wiki/Sites-that-run-Etherpad-Lite)。请选择支持SSL加密链接的站点，并且，在你把数据交给他们之前，最好查一下网站的背景。
name: Etherpad

description: 自行架设的去中心化社交网络
name: GNU social

description: GNUnet是一个完全自由的P2P网络。

description:
A port of the whole GnuPG 2.1 suite to Android.

Gnu Privacy Guard (GPG) gives you access to the entire GnuPG suite of encryption software. GnuPG is GNU’s tool for end-to-end secure communication and encrypted data storage. This trusted protocol is the free software alternative to PGP. GnuPG 2.1 is the new modularized version of GnuPG that now supports OpenPGP and S/MIME.
name: GPG for Android

description: Gpg4win is an installation package for Windows (XP, Vista, 7 and 8) with software tools and manuals for email and file encryption on behalf of the German Information Security Agency. Gpg4win itself and all tools of Gpg4win are free and open source software. The software mainly uses public-key cryptography for data encryption and digital signatures.
name: Gpg4win

description: 苹果OS X Mail的OpenPGP插件。
name: GPGTools

description: 面向所有人的开放、自由、中立的无线网络。
name: guifi.net

description: 跨平台IRC客户端。
notes: HexChat does not offer encrypted IRC by default. You need to enable the FiSHLiM plugin for IRC message encryption.
name: HexChat

description: 能为你和数千个网站间的通信加密
name: HTTPS Everywhere

description: 隐形因特网计划，采用大蒜路由，比Tor网络更优秀。
notes: 首先，I2P的目的主要是建立一个独立于因特网的隐蔽网络，而不是翻墙——目前他的默认出口节点只有一个，我们使用的客户端默认只是中继而非出口节点。其次，I2P的安全性和健壮性要高过Tor，并且它针对中国等敏感地区做了额外设定，默认使用隐身模式。最后，首次使用I2P需要进行网络引导。在中国，你可能需要使用VPN或其他前置代理进行这一步骤——亦或是导入其他人提供的节点数据库。积累了一些节点信息之后，I2P就可以独立稳定工作了。记得时不时运行一下，帮助网络壮大的同时，更新你的节点资料库。
name: I2P

description: Image hosting with in-browser AES-256 encryption.
notes:
The img.bi service is also available on Tor: [http://imgbifwwqoixh7te.onion/](http://imgbifwwqoixh7te.onion/).

And I2P as an [eepsite](http://imgbi.i2p/?i2paddresshelper=HlMhQ2p~WB9WiehsAa2IDfndqXTMTOeYfOIxpeQH5hSeXLxtwUhd9FsaYmXM-hq66jRREcTpBqNmbILwQsInuBnQ7PZTgLel4tdKMrKhUlxDout4eZ6uRRN6QMWX9YzDCV0cmLBWHRcZlFaBirs3RbF5neUXgdnNqgcvdanQEt5-XN05I5JrIe~Dld9vQ1Z0WSn10BcOtXDm7uxnaHqJUbhtfOgmFoGAxF~di220GpRCzDP6Eg9NRIwAGGFxH8Y7PEOmlqiUCOn5aHwxk2msqrFLzBy6aVWq-e8etrhDxckPvJby7G13QCmVCO-cOOYOObP6bk51t99t5DNxIsGEuoEaUHyVNqAf9jvMjAcqpt6Gdk8slcV528rnSXJ6Vu2gcYYnb~kmt7wtvgm46xTE0OXxdDAmbtsRu~U6oSxRROkw02Q7hdnMmiF86dTYxx-dQ6H8aPQJV1SM5cNlv3XfqBl-V0-TounGNPcj4279s4DUs7-FfhuKYJjbZj5KOlPNAAAA)

name: Ixquick

description: 加密的跨平台文本、语音、视频聊天工具。
notes:
Jitsi may [request non-secure information during encrypted chat](https://github.com/nylira/prism-break/issues/291) if you paste a link into it. 
Also, if Jitsi is set up to use Tor, it may [leak DNS information](https://trac.jitsi.org/ticket/1060) by not using Tor for DNS resolution.

Lastly, note that Jitsi records chat history in unencrypted form.
name: Jitsi

description: 基于Debian的CD/USB即插即用便携系统，附带匿名浏览工具等预设。
name: JonDo Live CD

description: Litecoin (sign : Ł ; code : LTC) is a peer-to-peer cryptocurrency and open source software project released under the MIT/X11 license. Inspired by and technically nearly identical to Bitcoin (BTC), Litecoin creation and transfer is based on an open source protocol and is not managed by any central authority. Litecoin is intended by its developers to improve upon Bitcoin and offers three key differences.
name: Litecoin

description: 分布式联合社交网络
name: Lorea

description: OpenPGP 邮件加密，支持多数Email服务器。

Warning: MediaCrush includes Google Analytics if you do not enable Do Not Track.

The hidden service is available at [http://mediacrs5ujufxog.onion/](http://mediacrs5ujufxog.onion/).
name: MediaCrush

description: 去中心化的媒体发布平台
notes: MediaGoblin does not encrypt any of your data by default.

description: 灵活的搜索引擎，将你的搜索请求经过代理发送到许多搜索服务提供商。

description: XMPP server based on Prosody, with advanced management/microblogging features.

description: 私密的、去中心化的社交网络服务器
name: Movim

description: 开源的web浏览器，扩展丰富。
notes:
Firefox does not hide your IP address from third-parties by default. If you want to anonymize your IP, consider using Tor Browser Bundle instead.

Firefox sends searches through Google by default. Consider changing it to DuckDuckGo or Startpage for anonymous web searches.

Considering unchecking "Block reported attack sites" and "Block reported web forgeries" in Tools -> Options -> Security (Windows & GNU/Linux) or Preferences -> Security (OS X) if you don't want Mozilla to send reported URL hashes to Google.
name: Mozilla Firefox

description: 跨平台的开源email应用，使用Enigmail插件，你可以实现邮件加密。
notes:
Thunderbird does not encrypt your email by default. [Here is a guide](https://securityinabox.org/en/thunderbird_main) by Security In A Box to encrypting your email with Mozilla Thunderbird, GNU Privacy Guard (GPG), and Enigmail.

Thunderbird can optionally connect over Tor with the TorBirdy addon.

While Thunderbird can be used as a chat and IRC client, it does not offer encrypted messaging.
name: Mozilla Thunderbird

description: 加密的低延迟的语音聊天
name: Mumble

description: 安全而私密的Kolab账号，服务器位于瑞士。
notes:
MyKolab is hosted in Switzerland and benefits from the [strong Swiss privacy laws](https://MyKolab.com/privacy). It is run exclusively with free software and using the service supports the development of Kolab. 
Also, you can export all your data at any time.
name: MyKolab

description: 分布式DNS，基于Bitcoin 技术
name: Namecoin

description: NetBSD is an open-source Unix-like operating system descended from Berkeley Software Distribution (BSD), a Unix derivative developed at the University of California, Berkeley. It was the second open-source BSD descendant to be formally released, after 386BSD, and it continues to be actively developed. The NetBSD project is primarily focused on high-quality design, stability and performance of the system.
name: NetBSD

description: 只启用你信任的网站上面的 JavaScript、Java 和 Flash 内容
notes:
Install **NoScript** and enable ‘Forbid scripts globally’ to improve the security of your browser by preventing 0day JavaScript attacks. This is a drastic option as it will render many websites unusable as they rely heavily on JavaScript.

NoScript offers a whitelist you can use to selectively enable JavaScript for sites you trust, but this is considered [especially bad for your anonymity](https://www.torproject.org/docs/faq.html.en#TBBJavaScriptEnabled) if you're using NoScript with the **Tor Browser Bundle**.
name: NoScript

description: 安装并启用这个插件来加密在Pidgin中的聊天
name: Off-the-Record Messaging

description: IOS平台上的开源浏览器，基于Tor。
name: Onion Browser

description: The Open Source Routing Machine or OSRM is a C++ implementation of a high-performance routing engine for shortest paths in road networks. Licensed under the permissive 2-clause BSD license, OSRM is a free network service. OSRM supports Linux, FreeBSD, Windows, and Mac platform.
notes: OSRM should be installed and run locally on your PC to avoid potential data leaks from the unencrypted online service.
name: Open Source Routing Machine

description: 可选择的开源网络分析服务。

description: 开源聊天程序
notes:
Pidgin stores your IM account passwords in [plain text](https://developer.pidgin.im/wiki/PlainTextPasswords). You can avoid this by (1) not saving your password in Pidgin, (2) encrypting your file system, or (3) storing your Pidgin password securely with the Debian package [pidgin-gnome-keyring](https://code.google.com/p/pidgin-gnome-keyring/).

Pidgin with OTR and dbus enabled has a local security bug. See the [upstream bug report](https://developer.pidgin.im/ticket/14830) for more information and possible workarounds.
name: Pidgin

description: 自行架设的照片库平台
notes: Piwigo does not encrypt any of your data by default.

notes: ProtectedText encrypts/decrypts text in the browser, and password (or it's hash) is never sent to the server - so that text can't be decrypted even if requested by authorities.

For those of you without a server, RetroShare is probably the easiest way to start your own encrypted social network.

description: 多前端多用途的通信工具
name: Salut à Toi

description: Scientific Linux (SL) is a Linux distribution produced by Fermi National Accelerator Laboratory and the European Organization for Nuclear Research (CERN).
name: Scientific Linux

description: 开放的去中心化的协作搜索平台
name: Seeks Project

description: Automatically delete cookies and local storage when they are no longer used by open browser tabs.
notes:
Only works with Firefox version 24 and above.

 The Android version is [available here](https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/android/addon/self-destructing-cookies/).
name: Self-Destructing Cookies

description: Simple distro based on CentOS with preconfigured mail, file sharing, web server, and more.
name: SME Server

description: 自行架设的版本控制和文件同步
name: SparkleShare

description: 私密、无记录的web搜索
notes: Startpage is a SaaS hosted in the USA and the Netherlands that provides you with anonymous Google search and image results through a free proxy.
name: Startpage

description: Free software VPN client derived from FreeS/WAN.
name: strongSwan

description: Lightweight and user-friendly e-mail client.
name: Sylpheed

description: 分布式匿名讨论区软件
name: Syndie

description: 自由和开放的云存储系统
name: Tahoe-LAFS

description: Live CD/USB 设计的致力于保护你的隐私和匿名性的系统
name: Tails

description: Protocol for realtime decentralized communication and personal data storage.
notes:
Tent mentions that it's still in alpha:
*"Remember, Tent is still in alpha, so it’s not safe to use with information you would not want to be public and should not be considered reliable."*
name: Tent

description: Cross-platform XMPP server written in Java.
name: Tigase

description: Free software daemon that uses tunnelling and encryption to create a secure private network
name: tinc

description: Tor (previously TOR, an acronym for The Onion Router)[not in citation given] is free software for enabling online anonymity. Tor directs Internet traffic through a free, worldwide, volunteer network consisting of more than four thousand relays to conceal a user's location or usage from anyone conducting network surveillance or traffic analysis. Using Tor makes it more difficult to trace Internet activity, including "visits to Web sites, online posts, instant messages, and other communication forms", back to the user and is intended to protect the personal privacy of users, as well as their freedom and ability to conduct confidential business by keeping their internet activities from being monitored.
name: Tor

description: 以加密、匿名的方式浏览
notes:
Using the TBB to sign into websites that contain your real ID is counterproductive, and may trip the site's fraud protection. Make sure to check for HTTPS before signing in to a website through Tor.

Signing into HTTP websites can result in your ID being captured by a Tor exit node.
name: Tor Browser Bundle

description: Add-on that makes Thunderbird/Icedove connect through Tor.
notes: TorBirdy is in beta and should be considered experimental. Please make sure that before using it, you are aware of the known issues and leaks by reading the "Before using TorBirdy" and "Known TorBirdy" Issues sections on the project website.
name: TorBirdy

description: Anonymous, decentralized P2P chat built on Tor Hidden Services.
name: TorChat

description: Extensible and customisable chat client for IRC and XMPP/Jabber.
notes: WeeChat does not offer encryption by default, but there is a FiSH encryption plugin available.
name: WeeChat

description: VM-friendly OS based on Debian and Tor focused on anonymity, privacy and security.
notes: Whonix is designed to be run inside of a virtualization package like [VirtualBox](https://www.virtualbox.org/). VirtualBox can be installed on Windows, Linux, OS X, and Solaris. This means that if you're stuck using Windows or OS X for whatever reason, you can install VirtualBox and use Whonix to increase your privacy and security.
name: Whonix

description: 自行架设的网站发布平台
notes: WordPress does not encrypt any of your data by default. Using avatars in WordPress will activate Gravatar, which which will send your email address to gravatar.com. Avatars are activated by default and can be turned off under "Settings > Discussion > Avatars". The default WordPress themes force your visitors to download Google Fonts. Consider switching to a completely self-hosted theme. You can also install the plugin “Disable Google Fonts” to remove this vulnerability.
name: WordPress

description: OTR加密的即时通讯用于Android.
name: Xabber

description: 其中心化的web搜索
name: YaCy

description: Personal distribution based on Debian with preconfigured mail, IM, and web server.
name: Yunohost

description: 自行架设的媒体管理系统
notes: Zenphoto does not encrypt any of your data by default.
name: Zenphoto

description: Validating, recursive, and caching DNS server.
name: Unbound

description: Self hosted git server.
name: GitLab

description: Firewall and router firmware based on FreeBSD.
name: pfSense

description: A GNU/Linux distribution for embedded devices.
name: OpenWrt

description: A GNU/Linux-libre distribution for embedded devices.
name: LibreWRT

description: A free software disk space cleaner, privacy manager, and computer system optimizer.
notes: BleachBit does not encrypt any of your data by default.
name: BleachBit

description: A free dynamic DNS service. Use it to update an easy DNS name with your changing/hard-to-remember IP address. As we use the standard protocols, we support a lot of routers / update clients and we even actively help you to configure them. We care for your security, privacy and comfort. You can simply use the free service available on our homepage or, if you prefer, you can also run the software on your own server.
name: nsupdate.info

description: Password Safe (Windows/Linux), designed by Bruce Schneier. Stores passwords, site URLs, email addresses, notes and much more into encrypted container file, so you only need to remember one master password. Can generate random passwords (with optional site-specific policies).
name: Password Safe

description: Password Safe (Android Port). Stores passwords, site URLs, email addresses, notes and much more into encrypted container file, so you only need to remember one master password. Can generate random passwords (with optional site-specific policies).
name: PasswdSafe

description: Free and open-source, peer-to-peer, encrypted instant messaging and video calling software. The stated goal of the project is to provide secure yet easily accessible communication for everyone.
notes:
Tox is a new encrypted communications system in the making. It is built upon a well known encryption library and has great potential, but it has not yet been audited by security professionals. Use at your own risk. If you decide to try out Tox, be sure to leave them feedback.

Tox does not yet have an official GUI but [several are recommended by the development team](https://wiki.tox.im/Binaries).
name: Tox

description: Meta search engine that protects privacy and intends to return neutral search results.
notes: Unbubble is a web search engine from Germany providing results in eight languages. Its primary goal is to create neutral search results. It takes strong measures to protect privacy.
name: Unbubble

description: Android open-source based project to detect and avoid fake base stations (IMSI-Catchers) or other base-stations (mobile antennas) with poor/no encryption. This project aims to warn users if the ciphering is turned off and also enables several other protection-mechanisms. Since it is under constant development, we constantly search for testers and security-enthusiastic developers with balls. Don't be shy, feel free to contribute, in any way you can. We're on [GitHub](https://github.com/SecUpwN/Android-IMSI-Catcher-Detector) and [XDA](https://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1422969). Thank you for participating in development! ;-)
notes: This App is highly experimental. Please read and fully understand our [DISCLAIMER](https://github.com/SecUpwN/Android-IMSI-Catcher-Detector/blob/master/DISCLAIMER).
name: Android IMSI-Catcher Detector (AIMSICD)
